Content.Text: Good morning, <MYNAME>. I'm coming in, OK?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, <MYNAME>, how's your farm doing? I
came here today to tell you about <RED>New
Year's Eve</RED>, which is two days from now.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
And that festival is... <RED>New Year's
Eve</RED>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
New Year's Eve is a festival where
everyone comes together to celebrate
as the new year begins.
<PAGE>
Special soba noodles will also be
served. It would be great if you
could join us!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
New Year's Eve is held on <BLUE>Winter 31</BLUE>
from <BLUE>9:00 PM</BLUE> at the <GREEN>festival grounds</GREEN>.
<PAGE>
On the day, be sure to come talk to me
at the festival entrance before <BLUE>11:00
PM</BLUE>, OK?
<PAGE>
You can't join in if you're late, so
watch the time, all right?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can confirm the festival's details
on the <BLUE>calendar</BLUE>, so look it over if you
need to.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well then, I must be on my way. Sorry to
barge in so early in the morning. Give
it your best today!
